yasserf.name: Yasser Fadl
yasserf.bio: Yasser enjoys playing with electronics ( usualy ending up soldering new cup holders )

wolframhempel.name: Wolfram Hempel
wolframhempel.bio: Wolfram worked all over the world before settling in Berlin and becoming a co-founder of deepstream.io. He also once studied art-history, but that's a different story and shall be told another time.
